theshadowreaper:TheDarkinScythe.NAME: The Darkin Scythe
DESCRIPTIONS: Gather #rRed or #bBlue essence from combat encounters (Elites count as 2). Upon gathering #b8 Essence of either type, Kayn can change from his base form into the form of #rtheshadowreaper:Rhaast or #btheshadowreaper:Shadow Assassin at a campsite.

theshadowreaper:Rhaast.NAME: Rhaast Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you damage an enemy with an attack(or #yReap [REMOVE_SPACE]), gain #b10% of damage dealt as #yTemp #yHP [REMOVE_SPACE].

theshadowreaper:DarkHarvest.NAME: Dark Harvest
DESCRIPTIONS: Killing an Elite or Boss grants #b1 stack of Dark Harvest. During Boss and Elite combats, gain #yVigor equal to your Dark Harvest stacks at the start of each turn.

theshadowreaper:BaseForm.NAME: Base Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b3 #yTemporary #yHP at combat start. NL
For the first #b2 turns of combat draw #b1 additional card.

theshadowreaper:TheCollector.NAME: The Collector
DESCRIPTIONS: You execute enemies below 5% health. NL When you kill an enemy gain 5 gold.

theshadowreaper:SpearOfShojin.NAME: Spear Of Shojin
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b5 cards played, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by #b1.

theshadowreaper:InfinityEdge.NAME: InfinityEdge
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacking an enemy with Vulnerable, gain #b1 #yTemporary #yStrength.

theshadowreaper:Hubris.NAME: Hubris
DESCRIPTIONS: When an enemy dies, gain #b5 #yStrength. NL At the end of this turn, lose #b5 #yStrength

theshadowreaper:DeathsDance.NAME: Death's Dance
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce damage taken by #b33% and instead store it within this relic. NL At the end of every turn take #b25% of the damage stored. NL Exiting a fight in any way removes all damage stored.

theshadowreaper:FirstStrike.NAME: First Strike
DESCRIPTIONS: Each combat, gain gold equal to #b20% of damage dealt with your first #b3 hits.

theshadowreaper:Predator.NAME: Predator
DESCRIPTIONS: Each combat, the first time you play a card that costs #b2 or more, draw #b1 card.

theshadowreaper:Electrocute.NAME: Electrocute
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn, if you play #b3 attacks, Deal #b
damage to an enemy.

theshadowreaper:Manamune.NAME: Manamune
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn, When you play 3 attacks, gain [E] .

Block and deal #b
damage to ALL enemies.

DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat, when you play #b5 attacks in a single turn, gain #b
Temporary HP.

theshadowreaper:ShadowAssassin.NAME: Shadow Assassin Form
theshadowreaper:ShadowAssassin.FLAVOR: The Darkin is gone. Our enemies are next.
DESCRIPTIONS: For every 25 unblocked damage dealt, draw a card.
